channel.title: Do i need that shit in the roaming folder?
channel.description: Can i just remove it? it will get saved again by the exe if its important right

item.title: Do i need that shit in the roaming folder?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Delete only the big files, and check what it is before you delete,
I would not delete all the files.
Flash game savefiles are there.
The torrent files from Âµtorrent.

item.title: Do i need that shit in the roaming folder?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Do you mean the content in %appdata% ?

If you delete it you may lose things you want.
But if you delete it, take backup to be sure nothing get lost if you want it again.

Read full topic
